mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Jacksonville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated August 26, 1861, to “My Dear Husband” from “Ellen” sent from Jacksonville, 1 original piece, 4 written pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
